description: A start flow created along with the agent

text: Hi, this is Ann from Travers

Travers differentiates itself with a focus on action sports, offering a user-friendly platform with no subscription fees, professional profiles for instructors, a comprehensive calendar management system, and QR codes for easy client onboarding.

Travers stands out by specializing in action sports, providing tools like detailed instructor profiles, an extensive calendar system, and QR code functionality for subscription-free, seamless scheduling and client engagement.

Travers encourages client commitment and aims to reduce no-shows by enabling direct communication and scheduling between instructors and clients. While it cannot guarantee client attendance, the platform facilitates an environment that promotes client responsibility and engagement.

Though Travers does not guarantee client attendance, it supports instructors in fostering client commitment through features that allow for direct scheduling and communication. The app encourages a culture of responsibility among clients, despite not offering specific mechanisms to assure attendance.
Travers is entirely free for instructors with no hidden fees, subscription plans, or charges for current features, ensuring full access to all functionalities without financial concerns.

Travers is free for instructors, offering complete access to its current features without subscription fees, future advanced functionalities may introduce costs, yet the core services will remain free.

Travers facilitates seamless communication by providing client contact details after bookings, enabling instructors to directly coordinate with clients for smooth lesson arrangements and ensuring effective client communication.

By offering client contacts post-booking, Travers ensures instructors can easily communicate with their clients, facilitating direct interactions for efficient lesson coordination and enhancing the overall teaching experience.

Travers includes an automated reminder system that helps ensure clients remember their upcoming lessons, reducing no-shows and aiding in efficient schedule management. This feature, combined with a seamless booking experience and reminders for booking the next lesson, plays a key role in retaining clients and encouraging them to rebook lessons, ultimately maintaining strong client relationships.

With features like automated reminders to inform clients about their scheduled sessions and a user-friendly booking process, Travers supports client retention by making it easy for clients to stay engaged and inclined to rebook lessons. This approach not only enhances the teaching experience but also ensures clients are consistently reminded and motivated to continue their learning journey, fostering lasting client relationships.

An active internet connection is essential for accessing the full functionality of Travers, including booking management and client communication. The app is optimized to function efficiently even with low internet connectivity, ensuring you can stay updated and communicate with your clients under various network conditions.

To utilize all features of Travers, such as managing bookings and communicating with clients, an ongoing internet connection is necessary. However, Travers is designed to operate effectively on low-speed connections, aiming to provide uninterrupted service and accessibility even in areas with limited internet access.

Travers currently does not support direct integration with social media accounts or personal websites and blogs. However, instructors can manually copy their Travers profile link and share it on their social media or personal website. The team is considering deeper integration options for social media accounts and personal website links for future development to enhance promotional and engagement capabilities.

While direct social media and website integration features are not available in Travers at this moment, instructors have the option to share their Travers profile link manually on social media platforms and personal websites for promotional purposes. The possibility of offering more integrated social media sharing and website linking functionalities is under consideration for future updates to the app, aiming to improve user experience and extend promotional reach.
Travers' community comprises hundreds of instructors, emphasizing quality interactions and is continually growing every day.
Our platform, Travers, focuses on quality engagement within a vibrant and expanding community of hundreds of dedicated instructors.
Travers features a dedicated help section for user support, offering guides and FAQs to help you navigate its features effectively.
A help section is available in Travers, providing tutorials and support to ensure you can fully utilize the app.

Travers enables instructors to effectively market their services with professional profiles that showcase their expertise, services, and availability. Through these profiles, instructors can share detailed information about their teaching style, experience, and special skills. Additionally, QR codes facilitate easy sharing and client onboarding, while promotional features are being developed to further support instructors in attracting and retaining clients.

Travers is designed to assist in marketing your sports instruction services. By creating a detailed professional profile, utilizing our calendar management system, and leveraging QR codes for easy client onboarding, you can effectively reach and engage with a wider audience.

Travers enables direct client bookings through a web booking form, providing a user-friendly interface for managing cancellations. However, it encourages new bookings in available slots instead of direct rescheduling to enhance user satisfaction.

Clients can book sessions directly with instructors using Travers' streamlined web booking form. The platform simplifies cancellations for both parties but opts for booking new slots over direct rescheduling to maintain a positive client experience.
Travers supports marketing your services through a comprehensive professional profile, enabling you to highlight your expertise and availability.
Your professional profile on Travers acts as a marketing tool, allowing you to promote your skills and services effectively to clients.
Travers regularly updates to introduce new features, enhance security, and improve user experience, based on user feedback and technological advancements.
Upcoming features for Travers include advanced analytics, enhanced communication tools, and more, aimed at meeting the evolving needs of our instructor community.

Travers streamlines booking management for instructors, featuring a comprehensive calendar and scheduling tool that allows for easy setup of availability, direct booking facilitation, and seamless adjustments to teaching schedules.

With its integrated calendar and scheduling functionality, Travers empowers instructors to manage their bookings efficiently, customize their teaching schedules, and maintain direct communication with clients for optimal coordination.

Travers is adaptable for instructors who specialize in private lessons, offering the flexibility to manage and schedule one-on-one sessions exclusively. Clients can book lessons for multiple participants, allowing for a form of group lessons within the app's settings, providing versatility in lesson planning.

While Travers primarily supports private lesson bookings, it accommodates the scheduling of sessions for several participants, effectively facilitating group lessons. This feature ensures instructors focusing solely on private lessons can also use Travers efficiently, with the ability to adjust participant limits in settings.

Travers does not directly handle payment processing, giving instructors the freedom to choose their preferred payment methods for transactions with clients. This approach ensures prompt and direct payments without intermediary delays, allowing for flexibility and control over financial transactions.

In Travers, financial transactions between instructors and clients are facilitated outside the app, allowing instructors to select the most suitable payment methods for their needs. This ensures secure, direct payments post-lessons, offering complete control over the payment process without the involvement of Travers.

Currently, Travers is available in English, with plans to expand its language support in the future. This anticipated expansion aims to cater to a global community of instructors and clients, enhancing the app's accessibility and user experience across different linguistic backgrounds.

Travers currently supports English, with intentions to broaden its linguistic offerings to include additional languages. This future expansion is designed to make Travers more accessible to a wider, global audience, ensuring a more inclusive experience for instructors and clients worldwide.
